pkgmetadata.longdescription: # glglueThe glue code which mediates between OpenGL and some GUI.GUI イベント(resize, mouse, keyboard, repaint) を OpenGL に橋渡しする。``` GUI OpenGL controller+--------+ +------------+| win32 |--window resize--->| Update || glut |--mouse input----->| Update || sdl |--keyboard input-->| Update || pyside6| | || gtk3 |--repaint--------->| Draw || gtk4 | +------------++--------+```And OpenGL utilities.## Requirements* Python 3.10## Site* <https://ousttrue.github.io/glglue/>* <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/glglue/>
